nodes.text: A female Human individual was the partner of the criminal Artagan Truax. At one point, the two joined the fanatical Bando Gora cult and became parents to a boy named Eogan. However, around 49 BBY, while Eogan was still an infant, the mother died. Artagan remained with the Bando Gora for some time, until he learned of the cult's planned murder of arms dealer Iram Radique. Artagan, Eogan and Radique then fled from the cult.
